column4: Is there a way to speed up ubuntu in recognizing a wireless network? I notice there is a 1-2 minute delay sometimes....it's not really a big issue but I had to ask
static addressing for you, too. It'd solve ti all.
what you mean by learn scripts? If it's just bash scripting, the advanced bash scripting guide is the best place to start and finish.
that's taught me more than any other document out there.
